movies.title: Riki-Oh
movies.plot: The story of a young man with the strength of 50 men who finds himself inside a harsh prison run by an evil assistant warden and the head boss who secretly has the ability to transform himself into a "Hulk" type monster. Riki, who is also secretly on a quest to find the hidden opium garden the prison warden has been growing, will learn something about himself that will change his life forever.
movies.simplePlot: The story of a young man with the strength of 50 men who finds himself inside a harsh prison run by an evil assistant warden and the head boss who secretly has the ability to transform ...

biography.bio: Nobuaki Fukuda was born on December 18, 1950 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Silence (2016), Naruto Shippûden: The Lost Tower (2010) and Naruto: Shippûden (2007).
biography.name: Nobuaki Fukuda

biography.bio: Nobuyuki Furuta was born on April 4, 1958. He is an actor, known for Castle in the Sky (1986), Appleseed (1988) and La légende de Blanche-Neige (1994).
biography.name: Nobuyuki Furuta

biography.bio: Tesshô Genda was born on May 20, 1948 in Okayama, Japan as Yokoi Mitsuo. He is an actor, known for Akira (1988), Ghost in the Shell (1995) and Beast King GoLion (1981).
biography.name: Tesshô Genda

biography.bio: Shô Hayami was born on August 2, 1958 in Takasago, Hyogo, Japan as Yasushi Ôhama. He is an actor, known for Super Dimension Century Orguss (1983), Macross Plus (1994) and Lain (1998). He is married to Rei Igarashi.
biography.name: Shô Hayami

biography.bio: Minoru Inaba was born on November 8, 1951 in Shizuoka, Japan as Masami Kawaguchi. He is an actor, known for Beast King GoLion (1981), Rakuen Tsuiho: Expelled from Paradise (2014) and Rurouni Kenshin: Wandering Samurai (1996).
biography.name: Minoru Inaba

biography.bio: Junichi Kagaya is an actor, known for Saiyuki (1999), Yome Syûtome Konyaku Sôdo (1991) and Reina kenrô densetsu (1989).
biography.name: Junichi Kagaya

biography.bio: Takehito Koyasu was born on May 5, 1965 in Yokohama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Sword Art Online (2012), Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997) and Mobile Suit Gundam Seed (2002).
biography.name: Takehito Koyasu

biography.bio: Satomi Kôrogi was born on November 14, 1966 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Pokémon (1997) and Twin Princess of Wonder Planet (2005).
biography.name: Satomi Kôrogi

biography.bio: Yasunori Matsumoto was born on February 7, 1960 in Chiba, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Slayers (1995), Slayers Next (1996) and Slayers Try (1997).
biography.name: Yasunori Matsumoto

biography.bio: Bin Shimada was born on November 20, 1954 in Nigata, Japan. He is known for his work on Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan (1993), Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984) and Trigun: Badlands Rumble (2010).
biography.name: Bin Shimada

biography.bio: Katsumi Suzuki was born on August 5, 1956. He is an actor, known for Ninja Scroll (1993), Spriggan (1998) and Mario Kart Wii (2008).
biography.name: Katsumi Suzuki

biography.bio: Toshiya Ueda was born on February 24, 1933. He is an actor, known for Princesse Sarah (1985), Vampire Wars (1990) and Golgo 13: Queen Bee (1998).
biography.name: Toshiya Ueda

biography.bio: Takeshi Watabe was born on March 21, 1936 in Kochi, Japan as Masato Maeno. He was an actor, known for Kagaku sentai Dainaman (1983), Super Sentai Zyuranger (1992) and High Speed Squadron Turboranger (1989). He died on December 13, 2010 in Japan.
biography.name: Takeshi Watabe

biography.bio: Ken Yamaguchi was born on April 24, 1956 in Fukushima, Japan. He is known for his work on Appleseed Ex Machina (2007), Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest (1990) and Armored Fleet Dairugger XV (1982). He died on October 24, 2011 in Japan.
biography.name: Ken Yamaguchi

biography.bio: Ryûzaburô Ôtomo was born on May 18, 1952 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ninja Scroll (1993), Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods (2013) and Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998).
biography.name: Ryûzaburô Ôtomo
